The Ville Casino

A first-class holiday for any traveler, find your paradise at The Ville. Feel the tropical setting, enjoy resort accommodations and premium cuisine. The perfect vacation of your dreams in Townsville, Australia

Resort Ville on the edge of the Great Barrier Reef

Here you will see heaven on earth and feel real bliss from a tropical holiday in The Ville. In our hotel you can find entertainment for a couple or a group of friends, any tourist will find his own paradise.

The hotel has 194 hotel rooms, decorated in the unique tropical style of North Queensland. Enjoy the lush scenery or take a dip in the indoor pool with bar. Gourmet cuisine awaits you for every taste. There are six interesting restaurants and bars on the territory of the hotel. The hotel has 194 resort rooms to suit all budgets. With over 300 days of sunshine a year and surrounded by stunning natural landscapes, Townsville will awaken your sense of wonder. From the underwater spectacle of the Great Barrier Reef to the vast outback scenery and lush rainforest.

Many attractions are close to the hotel including the Tropical Queensland Museum, The Strand, Flinders Street Mall and Magnetic Island, and a 20-minute ferry ride from the Sealink Ferry Terminal.

  • Restaurants at The Ville Casino Resort

    There is always an element of casual luxury in any Ville restaurant, and the variety of dishes will not leave you hungry. From Asian cuisine to casual modern Australian dining, it's all al fresco dining with open island views. If you like to drink and relax, then in our bars you can find a cocktail of your choice, or go to the buffet. Discover the taste of modern North Queensland.

  • Hotel rooms in The Ville

    It doesn’t matter for what purpose you eat on vacation, for work and important meetings, or just want to take a break from the bustle of the city. The laid-back coastal style ambience will immerse you in a paradise holiday, the hotel is close to Townsville Airport. There are rooms for every budget, you will find a real holiday in The Ville.

  • Evening entertainment

    If you love gambling, then we have a good offer for you. Visit our casino and try your luck with 370 slot machines, daily promotions and over 20 table games. Evaluate your odds in blackjack or roulette, or do you have a knack for picking the winning horse? No matter how you like to play, you will find it at The Ville.
